subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
Giro d'Italia (Bicycle Race)
lead_paragraph: Christian Vande Velde of the Garmin-Transitions team broke his right collarbone in a crash during Stage 3 of the Giro d’Italia, making it two years in a row that he has dropped out of the race with a serious injury.
snippet: Christian Vande Velde of the Garmin-Transitions team broke his right collarbone in a crash during Stage 3 of the Giro d’Italia, making it two years in a row that he has dropped out of the race with a serious injury.
